articles.author: Bloomberg
articles.title: French President Emmanuel Macron calls for reset of economic ties with China - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Xi is expected to land in France Sunday afternoon, the first stop of a five-day tour in Europe. | World News
articles.content:
French President Emmanuel Macron is calling for an update of the countrys economic ties with China, just as the countrys leader Xi Jinping is expected to travel to France for a State visit.
Chinese … [+1785 chars]
